entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 6:51 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. High 18.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Local amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High 18. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:51 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 6:51 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
